title: urugiDuvAi manamE
sahitya:
urugiDuvAi manamE vEl murugA murugA murugA enrE dinam


anupallavi

  varuvAi enadu jnAna guruvAi OmkAra japam taruvAi tirumAlin marugA SaNmukhA enrE


caraNam    sUra padmAsuran ahankArattai azhittavan toNDarai varuttiDum tuyargaLai ozhittavan
kAruNya viratanAnAm kaliyuga varadanAm kandanai shrI vaLLi kAntanaiyE ninandE
